content.detailedDescription:
I was lying in bed last night, facing the window, and through my blinds i saw a bright red light. when i opened the window the light was headed north in an arch. it was visable to me for about 45 seconds to 1 minute before it dissapeared over the horizen. at first i thought maybe it was a meteor, or some kind of firework or flare. 

i called my boyfriend over to the window and he thought it was very strange as well. i've never seen anything like it before and i haven't been able to get my mind off it today, trying to figure out what it was. 

if i held a baseball up to the light it would cover it, maybe just a bit smaller. either way it was so far up that it must have been very large! it was a round, red light with red beams or glare coming off. it seemed high up and then slowly arched its way down to the north until i couldn't see it anymore.

the object did not skip around, it simply glided through the sky in one smooth motion. 

i still think this is very strange, and like i said i have never seen anything like this. i'm just hoping maybe someone saw the same thing as us.
content.summary: There was a very large red light in the sky which seemed to fly very quickly in an arched line into the distance.

content.detailedDescription: Slow moving ball moving across the sky west to south. starting from left side of venus from belleville, mi pov.  made no sound, it was steady. appeared orange/yellow near venus, then looked white when it was over us.
content.summary: Slow moving ball moving across the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my car driving west in my neighborhood (fenwick neighborhood in edmond, ok) going less than 15 miles an hour (having started driving from a stop). i don't know the exact date, but it was mid march. it was around 2:45pm and a sunny and partly cloudy day.
i saw movement in the sky from the south descending down to the north right infront of me.  i couldn't tell how far or close it was.  i drove around the general area it would have landed if it were very close, but didn't find anything.
when i first saw it, i thought it was a shooting star. but this was happening during the middle of the day and the "shooting star" was a glowing green. the tail seemed more pale yellow/white.
it was moving fast like a shooting star.
i drove faster towards it to see if i could locate where it may have gone down, but had no luck. i lost sight of it when it went behind a nearby house.
i pulled over to see if i could see more objects, but did not see any others.
content.summary: Glowing green fireball during the day

content.detailedDescription: Everynight i see these objects in the distance that seem to get closer and closer to my house
content.summary: Cicular orbs that hover in near distance 1-3 objects

content.detailedDescription: Im a believer now! my wife and i were in the back yard between 9:30 to 10. the sky was cloudy. i looked up at a passing plane. headed north right over us. i saw behind it at a short distance a round object. gray/white seemed to have circles within circles from outer edge to center. looked like a full moon in shape and color. the movement was floaty ?  it seemd to move in one general direction with slight left or right movements.  thats it. really can't believe what we were seeing but know it wasn't a ballon...  i was getting my phone out of my pocket while looking and getting my camera turned on. i filmed the whole thing but it was dark and could not see anything.  i just watched the video and it was more like 1 to 2 mins of seeing this. so upset that i don't have it recorded!!!!  however from now on i will look up more often
content.summary: Cloudy night. my wife and i saw a plane above us then noticed a round object looking like a full moon following plane across the sky behind plane.

content.detailedDescription: Im a believer now! my wife and i were in the back yard between 9:30 to 10. the sky was cloudy. i looked up at a passing plane. headed north right over us. i saw behind it at a short distance a round object. gray/white seemed to have circles within circles from outer edge to center. looked like a full moon in shape and color. the movement was floaty ?  it seemd to move in one general direction with slight left or right movements.  thats it. really can't believe what we were seeing but know it wasn't a ballon...  i was getting my phone out of my pocket while looking and getting my camera turned on. i filmed the whole thing but it was dark and could not see anything.  i just watched the video and it was more like 1 to 2 mins of seeing this. so upset that i don't have it recorded!!!!  however from now on i will look up more often
content.summary: Cloudy night. my wife and i saw a plane above us then noticed a round object looking like a full moon following plane across the sky behind plane.

content.detailedDescription:
Just before 9pm april 26th, 2012, i had finished doing some yardwork and after i had put everything away, i stood on our deck to briefly survey what i had done that evening.  just before i went into the house, i noticed a bright orange light moving smoothly through the sky.  it was coming from the northeast and headed southwest.  it grew brighter as it came closer and passed overhead.  the object didn't make any sound that i could hear, nor did it pulse or flash.  it did have a very slight flicker, like fire would have.  the crescent moon was also hanging clear in the sky that night and the object appeared to be about half the size of the crescent of light on the moon (of course, who knows how large it actually was).  the object clipped along pretty fast - faster than a satellite or the space station when you see those in the sky.  i ran into the house before it passed completely overhead.  i grabbed my binoculars and tried to view it from a second story window that faced south, but could make out nothing.  my significant other was taking a bath and said it was probably just the space station but i said i thought it was too large.  i ran downstairs and outside to the sidewalk on the south side of our house to view the last of the object as it headed to the southwest.  i watched it until it got so far away i could not see it.  i then went back out onto the deck and noticed a second orange object traveling along the same path as the last one.  this one also made no sound but it did have a strange pulsing to it and was slightly different in shape.  as it passed overhead, i ran through the house to the south sidewalk to view it.  my significant other stood in the second story window and saw this second object as it traveled to the southwest.  i also noticed that as the object got farther away from us, i could see that it had maybe 4-5 distinctly separate lights at the rear in a straight up and down line.  it too, traveled southwest into the distance and out of sight.
that's my story.  i hope somebody else saw the lights, too, so i know i'm not crazy!
content.summary: Witnessed two bright orange lights traveling in a straight path in the sky overhead around 9pm.

content.detailedDescription:
Driving my car, saw a reflection in the sky.  stopped to get a better look and noticed two balloon like objects.  objects seemed much higher than a balloon should be, much higher than the airplane i witnessed.  

looked like a reflective surface.  had to move on in traffic.  that was the last i saw of it.
content.summary: Two balloon like objects way up in the sky

content.detailedDescription: 3 weeks ago i saw 2 unkowns, one then the other, traveling west to east, then i was one unknown travel from north to south, all of which were beyond our atmosphere. then i observed a light at about 1500-2000 ft travel from west to east. it was a lot brighter than any star, and i could easily tell that it was flying low. then for the next three weeks i observed the same light staying stationary over modesto from my house, it would show up at dark, and would usally leave after 10. i and my grandaughters saw it one night and i also have two pictures that i took.
content.summary: I watched it for 3 weeks

content.detailedDescription:
This was my 2nd time seeing something coming or going over this hill top. the first time i saw a really bright light shining over the sunol hills. the light was so bright that every detail on the top of the ridge was visible and clearly seen from hwy 680. i thought either an airplane was coming over the hill or either maybe va police helicopter was shining light over the ridge. the light was moving forward you could tell, but it was moving extremely to slow to be an airplane. the light was also way too bright and wide to come from an aircraft. the whole ridgeline was lit like a baseball stadium.Then the light moved forward over the hill towards 680.When the object came over the ridge at a very slow pace i could see a round flat shaped craft with lights that went all the way across the front kinda like in a half circle.No sooner than it appearedd over the ridge, it made a right turn and disappeared over the hill and the light was gone.

the object i saw last night was in the same area 680 and the sunol hillside. it looked like an airplane flying low next to the hillside heading south down 680. it was moving slow. had bright bright lights in front. object made its way down the path for maybe 30-40 seconds then made a right turn and began what looked like a descent to the valley on the other side of th hill.While it was turning i could make out a triangle shape with lights under neath but not bright. couldn't see the whole object kinda only the outline. i drive this hwy almost daily from san jose to stockton. i have not seen any major airline fly next to the sunol hillside on 680 south and also at an altitude barely over the ridgeline.In my whole life.
i am now really curious about what's on the other side of that hill, and i will be making a trip to see.
content.summary: Object fel over sunol hilltop down 680s then made right turn disappeared over the hill top.

content.detailedDescription: I was in myrtle beach driving and it's motion caught my eye.  i had no idea what it was but it was so different i had to photograph it.  it was a square object moving in a southerly direction at 1 o'clock in my visual field.  the object was extremely bright, moving rapidly towards the cone shaped area in the sky.  since i was in traffic i did not have the time to track it further.  later when i looked at the photograph i thought it was so unusual i needed to report it to you.
content.summary: Extremely bright square object with a straight line trajectory towards circular opening in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Sitting outside with a friend in east dallas looking at the stars when my friend pointed out movement overhead.  we observed an object about 1000 to 1500 ft above.  what we saw could easily have been overlooked at first as it was emitting no light or sound.  the object which was about the size of a plane, at first seemed triangular in shape but subtly changed in shape (kind of like mercury) to a boomerang appearance and at times ovular it was a dull grey color with a hazy mist and seemed to at times have a faint glow. we watched as the object moved nnw.  2 to 2 minutes later we observed a second boomerang-like object much more elongated and thin than the first.  this object could have at first glance passed as a flock of birds flying in v formation however it was solid, emitted a low glow and was heading smoothly nnw as well.
content.summary: 2 chevron shaped crafts

content.detailedDescription: At the cross of rte 16 and 11 in rochester nh, at about 9:30am my husband and i came over the hill, where there is alot of construction going on to expand the highway. i noticed a shining rectangle rotating horizontally and slowly. it apeared to be flat, one side was reflective and the other dark. at first we thought something was blowing in the wind, but it was very high up and stationary, not moving randomly. we tryed to make sense of it, did something fall from a plane? no fluttering movements the way something would have if it was falling. a kite? no strings and over a construction site with nothing around. our minds refused it, but it kept bothering us, so we turned around and by the time we got back to the spot it was gone.
content.summary: Flat rectangle rotating slowly

content.detailedDescription: i was walking across my back yard going to the front of my house i looked up and saw a really bright flurecent green ball of light the best way i can describe it is it looked like a comet shape around the front round part it had a little bit of red and blue it lasted for about 4 or 5 seconds it was moving in the derction from back yard towrd the front going through the sky it was about as high up as a big plane would fly i went in the house and told my feance about it i called carrol county 911 and ask them did anyone call and report the samething i saw she put me on hold for about a minute and come back and said that a officer had said he seen the samething and said it was just a metteroite me personally i dont know what i saw it made no sound but ive seen pictures of haleys comet comets and metorites from what ive seen are not this color i dont know how to feel about what i saw i just know it was defnently neet maybe somebody will be able to explain to me what it was i would like to know.
content.summary: Walking across yard looked up saw fluresent green light moving across

content.detailedDescription: Noticed small orange and yellow in color ball floating east to west on us highway 50 between w. sprinfield road and county line road between gerald and rosebud, missouri. nearly the size of a basketball. appeared to be similar to a luminary balloon for a memorial but did not share the same detail. shined a spotlight on it and it appeared to drift through the light, almost transparent. left area due to traffic, returned moments later and light was gone, checked fields near and nothing observed. 01:30hrs 4/27/12
content.summary: Small orange/yellow ball floating east to west

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving west bound on bee ridge road towards sarasota, there is local airport in sarasota, i noticed this because it was pure white with a slight glow, no marking with a tail on the back with no wings, i notice this object because it was traveling 8 to 9 times faster than a normal airliner.  it was headed due south in a straight line. when i first saw the object my jaw dropped down because i see airliners every day but because of the speed,white color and no wing it caught my attention very quickly. i just said wow.

it was traveling to fast to be any regular aircraft and there is a airbase in tampa and i see military planes all the time, the white glow and speed it must been traveling faster than any f-16 or any fighter jet travel a mach speed. no sound at all i would say it was traveling about 2500mph or faster
content.summary: White disk with a tail

content.detailedDescription: It was around 9:30 when i noticed a light to the east at about 30 degrees above the horizon. when i first saw the light it was at around 45 degrees ne and appeared to be moving to the south. i got my sony camcorder from my vehicle, which was parked right behind me in the driveway and began recording at 9:29. i then proceeded to film the object for about five minutes or so. i estimate the object was around three miles, approximately from my location. it appeared to be on a steady course to the south as it moved across the sky and did not appear to be changing altitude as it traveled. at first there appeared to be four lights with one of them blinking but as the object moved to the south it began to display more lights. soon there were six lights,two of which were blinking,the color of the lights were blue, white, and green. soon there appeared to be eight lights with two of them blinking. the object continued on its southerly course. at around 9:32 a red blinking light appeared as the most forward light and a third blinking blue light appeared behind it on what looked to be the center of the craft.At this point it appeared as if there were four blinking lights total with the rear lights blinking at a different interval than the red a blue lights at the front of the object. the object was now at about 100 degrees e and still on a southerly flight path. the number of lights visible were still the same. the craft continued on its course to the south and i lost sight of it behind a bank of trees at around 180 degrees. the whole sighting lasted around five minutes.I had just finished parking my vehicle when i felt compelled to look to the north east, if i had not done so i would not have seen this object nor been able to film it. this is not the first sighting of unidentified objects i have experienced, i had submitted a video clip of a ufo sighting to mufon already from a sighting i had in 2009. i was not excited so much as i was curious about the nature of the object.
content.summary: Appeared as a circular disc based on the arrangement of the lights i observed

content.detailedDescription: Me and my husband were driving home from a family event and i saw an airplane while looking out of my window, or so i thought until i saw like ten more flying with it. i immediately found this strange and turned to talk to my husband who was probably thinking me crazy at this point and when i turned back around to the window one was close enough for me to see. it was square for sure and had white lights on each corner and a red blinking light in the center of the square. i started ti get really scared and so we pulled over next to this field and he got out to see what i was making a big deal about. he got out and after observing them we noticed that they moved very fast and would change direction multiple times by turning on its side so it looked like an actual square outline then flattening again. there were tons. so we got back in the car and started driving again and we noticed as w got closer to our house that they were near there too and we stored to observe again after reaching our destination and they were hovering. we got scared and immediately ran inside and looked out of the window and there were none to be seen.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Square flying objects over southern indiana

content.detailedDescription:
White light, it looks twice the size of a planet you can see from earth,bare eyes, when you look at it for a half minutes,it looks like it's pulsating!
i noticed it when i looekd out the window, i was watching videos of songs.I watched a movie about ufo recently in my science class i didn't feel excited though. it's still there.

the pic i sent is really small... barely can see it
content.summary: White light, a twice the size of the star that you can see a planet near earth.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside on my back porch to smoke a cigg. i was talking with my husband and then right over my neighbors house i seen a small green light fall from the sky straight down. i waited for about 1 min. and then i turned to my husband and told him i just seen a small green light fall from the sky. he looked at me like i was crazy. i know what i saw. my husband and i got into our car and drove down the road to see if we could see anything. and of course there was nothing to be seen. the light i seen was light green it glowed kinda looked like a flare. it was falling downward. i never saw it again after driving back home.
content.summary: Small green light fail from sky

content.detailedDescription:
My house is oriented east.  i stepped out the front door around 2200, and noticed to the north a "star" shaped object moving from east to west at tree top level from my perspective and line of site.  it moved at a slow pace and was very, very bright.  i do not know how far away from me it was but i do know that it was nothing close to me.  i assume it was a mile or more away.   the light was white. there were no flashing lights observed, no sound could be heard and white was the only color of light that the object emitted during the sighting. the object itself was shaped like a star on a christmas tree, not like a star in the sky. the object was well defined with six points and did not appear to rotate or change altitude at any time during the sighting.  the object appeared to be larger than the moon as observed in the night sky.  the object did not seem to be transparent or see-through. the edges of the object were well defined and appeared to have a solid structure. i observed the object for about three minutes before i lost view of it behind some trees (wooded area).

1.  q:  where were you and what were you doing at the time?  
a:  i was in my front yard letting out the dog when i observed the object.  i actually walked out into my front yard and over to the side of the house during the sighting in order to continue viewing it.

2.  q:  what made you first notice the object?
a:  how bright it was.
    
3.  q:  what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?
a:  it was so bright and beautiful that at first i thought of jesus.  the bright white was very white. it was whiter than any white i have ever seen.  

4.  q:  describe the object and its actions and motions in detail.
a:  star shaped with 6 points.  the entire object was a bright, white light. it moved slowly from east to west in a straight line.  i could observe it through the tree tops.  the trees are about 50 feet from my house.

5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.
a:  i was in awe.  for lack of better words i was "star struck".  it was just so beautiful i had never seen anything like it in my life.  after the sighting i went in and told my husband about it.

6.  q:  how did you lose sight of the object?
a:  it moved behind some trees in the woods behind my house.
content.summary: Star shaped object emitting a very bright white light moving slow from east to west

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving south on ronald reagan blvd passing the rock quarry when i glanced up and saw an extremely bright white light hovering in the sky, looked like headlights from a car, then i went to grab my phone so i could take a picture. my phone fell and when i looked back up all the lights were off. i continued driving to try and get closer, and then i noticed two other cars pulled over so i pulled over behind them. i looked up and saw the white lights but this time they did not project like head lights. i also noticed on one side there was a very bright red flashing light while the opposite side had blue-green flashing lights. within seconds the perfectly round disc shaped object had started moving north and was across the sky. then in the blink of an eye it shot north and was gone.

i felt scared and wanted to cry, at the same time i wanted to know what it was. 
i tried to keep up with it but it disappeared. my first thought was that this is not a normal air craft.    

picture included is the bottom view
content.summary: While driving, i saw an object in sky and pulled over

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving west, sun was setting it was about 8:20 pm on 4-26-12  and i thought it was a chem trail but it wasn't getting any longer, so i thought i must be getting glare of my windshield or vehicle so i moved my head around and what i thought was some kind of glare never moved or disappeared. i kept an eye on it and it suddenly tipped it's side closest to me downward and that is when i could see it was an oblong saucer shape. it was glassy giving the appearance of being translucent with a dark tinted ring on top side that looked like a tinted window, a gray metallic edging outlined the outer edges. i had to curve to the south west and the sun was not shinning and i could still see it, then houses blocked my view for about a 1/4 of a mile and i turned west and it was no longer there, just nothing. this was over saginaw mi

i couldn't tell you how big or high up, just it was way below clouds, i am not good at judging distance or size with nothing to compare it to beside it.

i am 54 and have never seen an ufo in day light, but have seen strange lights at night and this was amazing i was in awwwww. as soon as i got home i had to call my friends and tell them. i am still in awwwwwwww.
content.summary: Glassy transparent like withgray metalic edging, oblong saucer with band of dark i took to look like a tinted window  on skyward  top side

content.detailedDescription:
Beginning november 2011 (don't laugh) i built a radio from a quartz crystal and my high frenquency ship's radio on my sailboat...And through focusing my frequency i asked ufo's, inter-dimensional beings, et's and beings that are here to help the planet come join me on/in my sailboat to help me heal the world.  there is a lot more to this, as "just believed they were there" and "thanked them for their time and for coming."  

after about two months of calling them through my radio and then "holding a healing service for the world," i was directed to begin photographing the inside of the boat...And to my surprise, there were many beings, orbs, "things that i cannot explain" and phenomenon of all kinds showing up in the photos.  after a while, some of these things began to be visible to my naked eye.

soon "i was told" that the inside of the boat had become too crowded" and that "they" had moved outside.  in short, i believe that i opened up a portal to another or several other dimensions...But that is not the point.  i knew what i was doing and i knew what i expected to happen and it did.

i asked beings and ufo's and entities and "things" from many dimensions to come and help me pray for the world (again don't laugh...As the photos speak for themselves).  "we" held a "service" for one hour every single day for five months...And every single day many unusual beings and ufo's and entities came and either i assisted them or they assisted me.  soon, "they" allowed me to take their pictures.  and within three months...Thousands of beings and "universes" of all kinds began showing up in, on, around the boat.

it will be difficult for me to describe each photo (as i need to do) in this forum.  so, someone from mufon please contact me with an email address to send the photos and the descriptions to.  i will include a few photos...But here is the point:

"they" came to my boat because i asked them to...And they kept coming back because i thanked them for taking time out of their busy schedules and for helping us here on earth.  we are not alone.  we have a lot of help...If we ask and if we are appreciative.  further, these beings are very real as you can clearly see by the shadows they cast.  but more interesting is the fact that our physical reality is a tiny pin prick of the incredible reality that exists in other dimensions...And i have been allowed to pier into those realities.  i guess they showed themselves to me so i can share with the world that "they are here."  "they are here to help."  "they are very, very real."

i will be happy to share my extensive collection of photos with anyone who requests...And share the rest of the story.  i am putting a website together and will have my photos, experiences and story online soon.

most of the photos are self-explanitory.  however, the photo of me up on top of the sailboat mast-you will need to look for the black object just below me and to the right of me in the base of the clouds and bring that object in by blowing up the photo.  my experience with these ufo's is that they are either drones or some different type of life form...A living entity very different than an organic life form we are used to seeing on earth.  anyway...This guy came around a lot.

as for the black/greyish being that is in the photos...Most of him is sort of in my refridgerator.  i have two photos of him.  he is very real as noted by the shadows cast on the floor and walls.

as for the rest of the rockets and tiny universes and energy beings and light orbs and ufos (those are the bright lights in the busy photos)-that will take a lot of explaining...Some of the phenomenon i could clearly see with my naked eye and some was/is (i still have the phenomenon around me) when i photographed them.  

note: the first photo of the orb inside my boat was the beginning.  if you load this photo on your computer and blow it up and look around, you can find over 25 light entities in just this one photo...And this is just the very beginniing.  subsquent photos have hudreds.  please let me know where to send the rest of the photos.  enjoy.
content.summary: I am being visited by hundreds of entities, objects, orbs, beings, ufos

content.detailedDescription: This structure rises above the lunar surface, odd shaped for rock.  could be a lunar base. odd carved feature that sits atop the structure.
content.summary: Strange structure on the moon louisiana. lunar base???????

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from a friend's house at around 4:45 am. i consumed no alchohol or drugs, prescription or illegal before, during, or after the event. as i was turning onto a side street in my home town of huntsville, alabama, i spotted a series of lights drifting toward the car. as soon as i could, i stopped the car to observe the object. i rolled down my window, to make sure that it was not a glare from lights or anything else. the object was roughly triangular in shape; i could see some light from the city reflected off of the clouds, and the object appeared as a black triangle. there were four lights: a red light near each corner and a somewhat larger white light in the center. my car was on the cd function, but there appeared to be radio static just before i observed the object. the object drifted to a point slightly to the left and ahead of me, before hovering for a few seconds. then, the object flew at a somewhat greater speed to my right and behind me. i was not able to see it go over the horizon or depart in any other manner. i then proceeded to go directly home and did not see any further activity.

i have never seen any unidentified flying objects before or since, and i do not believe that extraterrestials have visited earth. i have eliminated the possibility of an airplane or helicopter because the shape of the object was certainly apparent, and there was absolutely no sound from the object. there were no other cars on the road at or near that time. there is an army base, redstone arsenal, in this city. there is also a large nasa presence due to the marshall spaceflight center. i am almost certian that this was a military or government vehicle; i doubt that private entities would be able to manufacture this and, again, i do not believe that extraterrestrials can or are visiting earth.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Triangular lighted object moved, hovered, then departed as seen from car

content.detailedDescription: Me and 2 men, ages 75, 68 and 35 were standing around talking about the ground we were grading, when the 68 yr man witnessed a flash in the sky, we turned and watched the object for about 25 seconds. it pulsated, flashed and was waiting for it to move but it dissipated without a trace.
content.summary: Was standing talking to a 75 yr man and a 68 yr man when the 68 yr man witnessed it first, bright flashes, then dissapeared

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work on the 60 freeway towards moreno valley in california. it was around 6:10pm and as i was driving everyone had to of noticed this green blue light in the sky. it was very very bright it stayed stationary for about 3 seconds then disappeared and reappeared for another 5 seconds then vanished into thin air.
content.summary: I was driving home from work and witnessed a very bright blue green light in the sky disappear and reappear for about ten seconds.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my porch getting some fresh air,for some reason i started watching the sky.I was looking at the stars when i seen a very bright what i thought was a star.When i noticed it was moving i was thinking o.K it has to be a plane but it was to high to be a plane.It moved from point to point very fast zig zaging no plane can move like that.Then it shot off i did not see it again,
content.summary: At first it looked like a star as it got closer.It had a differant look about it.

content.detailedDescription:
Just wanted to let you know that there were several sightings over my neighborhood tonight around 9:30-9:45pm. we live in the vicinity of mccoy park , around 24 highway and pleasant. two triangular objects flying fairly low and no sound were side by side, with reddish lights on each corner...Then appeared to merge into one and glide off toward truman library. another small white light was seen stopping and starting around the same time, very high up, then an orangish light flew over making no sound.
 
this was witnessed by several in the circle drive.The night before, a huge triangular object drifted overhead at treetop level in the same area, no sound appearing to be grayish. this is the second time in a couple of weeks this neighbor witnessed this object. no lights.
 
about a week ago, my son and i saw a neon colored orange orb moving at a high rate of speed around crysler and scott. we pulled over and turned off the car. the object made no sound -flew toward the west and into a cloud and disappeared.
 
about three months ago, i saw the same colored object -only it appeared to just drop straight down out of the sky.As it fell, it slowed down and hovered, looking somewhat like a flame on a gas stove right after it is turned on. then, it narrowed down to smaller orb, neon orange. it hovered briefly, then began to float away to the south. it hovered again, then turned to the west, entered a cloud and faded. it was also soundless, but this one higher up than the last one we saw. i saw it around 10pm, and called my son out to also see it as it drifted to the west.
 
please let me know if there have been other sightings lately! i appreciate it. call me with any further questions.
content.summary: Several sightings over a period of time
